snippet: A court handed down sentences of 10 to 22 years in prison on Tuesday to 10 defendants accused of kidnapping and forcing into prostitution a young woman whose disappearance raised global awareness about human trafficking.
lead_paragraph: A court handed down sentences of 10 to 22 years in prison on Tuesday to 10 defendants accused of kidnapping and forcing into prostitution a young woman whose disappearance raised global awareness about human trafficking.

headline.main: Argentina: Stiff Sentences for 10 in Retrial of Human Trafficking Case
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Stiff Sentences for 10 In Retrial of Human Trafficking Case
